about_the_game:
VR DLC is required for VR support.


VR DLC was developed thanks to the many requests of our fishing community! Thank you for such great support for our game!

The VR version offers you full compatibility with popular VR sets, so you can experience an unforgettable experience, traversing water from around the world!

Put on VR goggles and feel like you're spending time on the water looking for the biggest and most difficult fish to catch.
